title: nitrobetting
author: nitrobetting
content: TAKE NOTE: The #GoAvsGo are 5-1 in the last 6 meetings.They're set as +100 undergods against the #Lightning.The latest odds can be found here ⤵️https://n2g.io/dab20e3

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: nitrobetting on June 20, 2022, 04:29:36 PMTAKE NOTE: The #GoAvsGo are 5-1 in the last 6 meetings.They're set as +100 undergods against the #Lightning.The latest odds can be found here ⤵️https://n2g.io/dab20e3Tampa is usually good at home but I'm liking the avs here not bad pricing, can get some decent value throwing them on a parlay.  Honestly after last game it doesn't look like they will lose a game but I guess anything can happen.
